net.foxycorndog.thedigginggame.map

Class Chunk

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.thedigginggame.map.Chunk

  • public class Chunk
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that holds the information for each of the chunks. Such information includes the relative location of the chunk, the size of a Chunk, and the tiles in the chunk.
    Since:
    Feb 22, 2013 at 4:23:18 AM, v0.1
    Version:
    Feb 22, 2013 at 11:52:23 PM, v0.1
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak

    • Constructor Detail

      • Chunk

        public Chunk(Map map,
     int rx,
     int ry)
        Constructs a Chunk in the specified Map at the specified relative location.
        Parameters:
        map - The map to add the Chunk to.
        rx - The relative horizontal location.
        ry - The relative vertical location.

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public void generate()
        Method that generates the terrain of the chunk.

      • addTile

        public void addTile(Tile tile,
           int x,
           int y)
        Adds a tile to the newTile queue. The update() method has to be called after this call to update the Buffers.
        Parameters:
        tile - The tile to add to the queue.
        x - The horizontal location of the new Tile. (0 - CHUNK_SIZE-1)
        y - The vertical location of the new Tile. (0 - CHUNK_SIZE-1)

      • update

        public void update()
        Method that updates the current Tiles with the newTiles.

      • render

        public void render()
        Method that renders all of the Tile to the screen.

      • getRelativeX

        public int getRelativeX()
        Returns:
        The horizontal location relative to the origin.

      • getRelativeY

        public int getRelativeY()
        Returns:
        The vertical location relative to the origin.

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Returns:
        The horizontal location relative to the origin in pixels.

      • getY

        public int getY()
        Returns:
        The vertical location relative to the origin in pixels.

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Returns:
        The width of the Chunk in pixels.

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Returns:
        The height of the Chunk in pixels.

      • isCollision

        public boolean isCollision(Actor actor)
        Checks whether there is a collision with the Actor and any of the Tiles.
        Parameters:
        actor - The Actor to check collisions on.
        Returns:
        Whether there is a collision.
